summary: This portrait of Hilary Knight, the artist behind the iconic Eloise books, sees him reflecting on his life as an illustrator and his relationship to his most successful work.
cast: Mart Crowley|Lena Dunham|Tavi Gevinson|Mindy Kaling|Hilary Knight|Fran Lebowitz|Phoebe Legere
title: Soy yo, Hilary
